column2: You can choose a personal patron deity from among the many powerful gods and godesses of the Hellenic faith.
I should dedicate myself to a particular deity and let their power inform my rule.
Jupiter, the highest of the gods.
Pluto, lord of the underworld and its riches.
These are all powerful deities. Choosing one of them as my patron deity would be a testament to the power of my dynasty.
Mercury, patron of trickery and thieves.
Minerva, mentor and guide to heroes.
